author: GittyAiden
title: New Vital Skincare Concealer for Dark Circles: Lift, Hydrate, and Blur Lines
text:
Well, well, well! Let‚Äôs dive into this beauty conundrum, shall we? ‚ÄúDark circles‚Äù‚Äîthe under-eye burglars that steal our brightness and joy. Much like that time I tried to impress a date with my cooking skills, only to accidentally set off the fire alarm.
According to our source of the day, tackling those stubborn dark circles can be more complex than a late-night argument with your mate over who deserves the last slice of pizza. Apparently, layering concealers is where it‚Äôs at for those extreme cases, which sounds suspiciously like a makeup version of ‚ÄúInception‚Äù‚Äîthe dream within a dream. You‚Äôve got your corrector concealer on the bottom, doing the dirty work of canceling out the color, and then your regular concealer comes in to save the day. Honestly, by the time you‚Äôre done, your face might look more like a multi-layered cake than a human visage!
Now, winter is upon us, and with it comes that lovely ‚Äúpale and ashy‚Äù look‚Äîalso known as the ‚ÄòI just crawled out of a cave‚Äô vibe. In a brave attempt to combat this chilling phenomenon, there‚Äôs a new kid on the block‚ÄîGucci Westman‚Äôs Vital Skincare Concealer. This product claims to reduce dark circles by 15% after eight weeks of use. Eight weeks? At that rate, my social life will have turned into a documentary about the life of a hermit! But seriously, if it hydrates, blurs, and lifts, it sounds like a miracle in a tube.
And let‚Äôs talk about the star ingredients! Liquorice, caffeine , and Hyaluronic Acid ‚Äîsounds more like the ingredients for my new cocktail rather than a skincare product, but I‚Äôll take it! Caffeine for those 7 a.m. Zoom calls? Yes, please! The concealer is not just a pretty face in a fancy bottle; it‚Äôs a powerhouse of skincare wizardry designed to tackle those bags you didn‚Äôt even know you were carrying.
The excited buzz from celebrity makeup artists like Kat James is promising! They‚Äôre raving about this concealer, claiming it knocks out unwanted shadows. It‚Äôs lightweight, and thank goodness‚Äînobody wants to feel like their under-eyes are wearing a heavy jumper during a heatwave‚Äîlest we risk looking like a hot mess.
Now, let‚Äôs talk about the ‚Äúblurred lines‚Äù feature. If you thought we were referencing Robin Thicke‚Äôs infamous tune, you were wrong! This is all about diffusing the pesky little lines that pop up after a few hours, the same way my high school crush would appear and disappear like it was an elaborate game of hide and seek. With this blurring formula, you can smooth over those tiny lines like a skilled DJ mixing tracks at a party. The kicker? It‚Äôs self-setting! No need for powder‚Ä¶ You can leave the setting powder at home and do a little cha-cha while you‚Äôre at it.
So, ladies and gents, if you‚Äôre ready to go undercover (pun intended) and tackle those dark circles once and for all, maybe it‚Äôs time to put the ‚Äúfun‚Äù back in fundamental skincare with Gucci‚Äôs Westman Atelier Vital Skincare Concealer. With all that hydration, blurring, and lifting, you‚Äôre practically set to face the world like a star. Just be careful not to confuse it with your regular tube of toothpaste. That‚Äôll certainly put a damper on your morning routine!
And remember, folks, if all else fails, there‚Äôs always sunglasses‚Äîfashionable and functional, just like me on a Saturday night! Cheers to brightening up those under-eyes‚Äîjust don‚Äôt forget to let your personality shine through; that beauty truly never goes unnoticed!
New Concealer Westman Atelier Vital Skincare Concealer Pic: Supplied The highly anticipated Westman Atelier Vital Skincare Concealer has just arrived in Ireland, captivating beauty enthusiasts and celebrities alike.
This innovative product, part of Gucci Westman‚Äôs clean beauty collection, seamlessly blends skincare with makeup, garnering admiration from A-listers like Jennifer Aniston, Reese Witherspoon, and Gwyneth Paltrow.
Available in 16 flattering shades, this concealer is priced at ‚Ç¨52 and is a true hybrid beauty product. Enriched with potent ingredients like liquorice, caffeine, and Hyaluronic Acid, it promises to tighten, brighten, and deeply hydrate the delicate under-eye area.
Dark Circles Celebrity MUAs, including the acclaimed Kat James, have praised the Vital Skincare Concealer for its remarkable ability to eliminate dark circles and unwanted shadows.
This lightweight liquid formula strikes the perfect balance with the right amount of pigments, providing excellent coverage without settling into fine lines or causing creasing around the eyes.
Blurred Lines Before & After with the new concealer Pic: Supplied In addition to combating dark circles, it firms and hydrates the under-eye area, addressing the common issue of dryness in skin devoid of oil glands that cannot maintain moisture on its own.
This innovative concealer features a self-setting formula, effectively minimizing the appearance of small lines and cracks that can develop as the day goes on.
By utilizing this unique blurring formula, Gucci has ensured that the concealer provides lasting smoothness without requiring additional face powder, elevating the standard for dark circle coverage.
*This post may contain affiliate links
**Interview ‚Å£with Gucci Westman: The Mind Behind the New Vital Skincare Concealer**
**Interviewer:** Welcome, Gucci! We‚Äôre‚Å¢ so excited to chat‚Å£ about your new Vital Skincare Concealer. Dark circles‚Äç are a beauty dilemma that many of us face. What inspired you to create‚Äç a product specifically‚Å¢ targeting this issue?
**Gucci Westman:** ‚Å§Thank ‚Å£you for‚Å§ having me! ‚ÄãDark circles have been a personal concern ‚Äãof mine for years, and‚Å¢ I wanted to‚Äã develop a product that not ‚Å£only conceals but also actively improves the skin over time. It‚Äôs about combining makeup ‚Å£with skincare‚Äîmaking sure that while we‚Äôre covering imperfections, we‚Äôre also‚Å¢ nurturing the skin.
**Interviewer:** That sounds fantastic! I‚Äôve heard it reduces dark‚Äå circles by 15% after eight weeks‚Äîhow does‚Äç it achieve that?
**Gucci ‚ÄåWestman:** The Vital Skincare ‚ÄçConcealer is packed with ingredients like‚Å¢ liquorice, caffeine, and Hyaluronic Acid.‚Å¢ Liquorice helps to brighten and even out ‚Äãskin tone, caffeine reduces puffiness and improves circulation, while Hyaluronic Acid deeply ‚Äåhydrates the skin, making ‚Å§it look more plump and youthful. It‚Äôs ‚Å£a formula designed to fight those pesky dark circles while you ‚Äãwear it.
**Interviewer:** So, it‚Äôs not just about‚Å§ covering up. I also loved ‚Äãhow you mentioned the blurring‚Å¢ effect. Can you ‚Äãexplain how‚Äã that works?
**Gucci Westman:** Absolutely! The blurring technology in our concealer diffuses light, which helps to smooth ‚Å§out the appearance of‚Äå fine lines ‚Å§and shadows under the eyes. It creates a soft-focus effect, so you look‚Å§ fresh and‚Äå awake‚Äîjust ‚Äãlike‚Å§ a‚Äã good night‚Äôs sleep!
**Interviewer:** That‚Äôs amazing! ‚Å£And can you tell us about‚Å§ the texture? We hear it‚Äôs lightweight.
**Gucci Westman:** ‚ÄçYes, ‚Äåit‚Äôs‚Äã incredibly lightweight! I wanted ‚Äçsomething ‚Äãthat feels breathable and doesn‚Äôt ‚Äçsit heavily ‚Å§on the skin, especially during‚Å§ those warmer months. Nobody wants their under-eyes‚Äç feeling weighed down. It‚Äôs ‚Äåself-setting too, ‚Äãso‚Äã you can skip the powder, allowing for a more natural finish.
**Interviewer:** It definitely sounds like a‚Å£ game-changer. With winter approaching, ‚Äçmany of us face the ‚Å§‚Äúpale ‚Å§and ashy‚Äù look. How does ‚Äçyour concealer address this concern?
**Gucci Westman:** That‚Äôs a ‚Äãgreat point!‚Äç The Vital ‚Å£Skincare Concealer comes in 16 shades to cater ‚Äåto‚Å¢ various ‚Å£skin ‚Å£tones,‚Å§ allowing everyone to find their perfect match. By hydrating and ‚Äãbrightening the under-eye ‚Äãarea, it ‚Å£helps to combat that winter dullness and give ‚Å¢a more vibrant ‚Äçlook.
**Interviewer:** It‚Äôs safe to say‚Å¢ there‚Äôs a lot to love about‚Äç this product! ‚ÄçAny‚Å¢ last tips for our readers when it comes ‚Å§to concealing dark circles?
**Gucci Westman:** ‚ÄçAlways remember to start with a good skincare primer ‚Äåfor your under-eyes before ‚Å¢applying the concealer.‚Äå It creates a smooth base and enhances the hydrating ‚Å£effects of the concealer itself. And don‚Äôt shy‚Å¢ away from playing around with ‚Å¢different‚Å¢ applications, whether it‚Äôs using your fingers, a brush, ‚Äåor‚Å¢ a sponge. ‚ÄãFind‚Å£ what works best for ‚Å£you!
**Interviewer:** Thank you, Gucci! Your concealer seems ‚Äçlike a ‚Äãbeautiful blend of makeup and skincare, and we can‚Äôt wait to try it out!
**Gucci Westman:** Thank you! ‚Å¢I hope everyone loves using‚Äã it as much as I loved creating it!

author: mediapost.com
title: Astronauts Will Be Stylin' In Prada Spacesuits 10/18/2024
text:
by Tanya Gazdik , 62 minutes ago
Prada and commercial space company Axiom Space are partnering on what might be the most stylish spacesuit ever.
‚ÄúUnveiled during the International Astronautical Congress in Milan on Wednesday, the mostly white suits feature a cropped torso and stone-gray patches across the elbows and knees,‚Äù according to CNN Style . ‚ÄúAlthough conspicuously free of branding or logos, the designs do include red accent lines across the forearms, waist and ‚Äòportable life system backpacks,‚Äô which nod to Prada‚Äôs sub-brand, Linea Rossa.‚Äù
The new suit will be worn for NASA‚Äôs Artemis III moon mission in 2026, marking the first return to the moon by a human since 1972.
‚ÄúThe modernized suits are meant foremost to keep astronauts safe in the throes of space‚Äôs harsh environment, with improved mobility from earlier designs as a close second mandate,‚Äù according to NPR . ‚ÄúThe suit is one size fits all and includes lights, an HD camera, 4G/LTE communications, and in-suit nutrition.‚Äù
advertisement
advertisement
Prada reached out to Axiom, which had just bid for the NASA contract, several years ago. This isn‚Äôt the first time the fashion world and space have overlapped.
‚ÄúPast Prada employees who worked on Linea Rossa have moved on to jobs at SpaceX and Boeing,‚Äù according to The New York Times . ‚ÄúAt the same time, the brand‚Äôs expertise in crafting made-to-order, personalized garments proved to be an asset when crafting made-to-order, personalized spacesuits.‚Äù
The stylish suits will be worn by the first woman on the moon and the first person of color, according to Vogue .
"We are witnessing the beginning of a new era, as the internet was in the 1980s," said Lorenzo Bertelli, chief marketing officer of Prada, according to Wired . "Today access to space is still something for the few, but just as in computing, in a few years prices will come down. Everyone should indulge in the beauty of an adventure."

author: @Vijestime
title: Turkish prodigies skilfully used the mistakes of our chess players, female chess players celebrated their fifth triumph
text: The defeat of the men and the victory of the ladies marked the eighth round of the 45th Chess Olympiad in Budapest. Our Psahists suffered their third defeat, with five victories, after today Turkey was better 2:5:1,5. Our chess players can regret the missed opportunities in today's duel, and the lack of sporting luck brought defeat in the duel with an exceptional opponent. Our front board, Denis Kadric, once again demonstrated his excellent knowledge of the Italian defense, and after a tactical strike in the fifteenth move, he gained a significantly better position, which he converted into a full point with precise play, his fifth in eight rounds. Current national champion Nikita Petrov, in an equal position, allowed the initiative to pass to sixteen-year-old Ediz Gurel, and the young Turkish chess player took advantage of Petrov's indiscretions and won. At that moment, the duels between Nikola ƒêukiƒá and Luka Dra≈°koviƒá remained to be played. ƒêukiƒá allowed his opponent, the thirteen-year-old child prodigy and grandmaster D≈æagiz Kan Erdogmus, to occupy the space in the game, who then gained a full point with precise play. The game between Luka Dra≈°koviƒá and Emre Kan, after a great fight, ended in a draw, which set the final result of the match. Our ladies registered their fifth victory in the tournament, defeating the Algerian team with 2,5:1,5. First, the game ended on the third board between Aleksandra Miloviƒá and Zineb Dina Abdi, who agreed on a draw after a mutually accurate game. Nikolina Koljeviƒá skilfully used the advantage gained in the opening and brought our team into the lead, defeating Rania Nasr. With the precise game of Aleksandra ≈Ωerebecova, she registered her sixth victory in the tournament, so our team got two new points, which was not prevented even by the defeat of Alena Skvorcova on the second board. After eight rounds, both our selections have 10 points each, i.e. five wins and three losses. There are three more rounds remaining, in which our teams will look for a chance for new victories. After eight rounds, the Indian national team is in the lead in both competitions, which has the maximum performance in the men's competition, while Poland is tied for first place with India in the women's competition, so the possibility that both winning cups will travel to the cradle of the ancient game seems more and more certain. The ninth round is on the program tomorrow from 15 p.m. Bonus video:

author: time news
title: Tributes and Condolences at Chennai Island for DMD Chief Vijayakanth's Funeral - timenews
text: People Grieve the Loss of DMDK Leader Vijayakanth Chennai: The city of Chennai is in mourning as people are gathering to pay their respects to the body of DMDK chief Vijayakanth, who passed away on December 28th. His body is currently kept at Chennai Island, where politicians and screen celebrities have visited to offer their condolences to his family. After his death, Vijayakanth‚Äôs body was first kept at his Saligramam house before being brought in a procession to the Demudika office in Coimbatore. This resulted in a large gathering of party workers, fans, and the public, with fans even coming from southern districts and even from Karnataka to pay their respects. However, due to the lack of adequate arrangements to accommodate the large crowd, there were issues that led to the body being moved to the island. The Chennai Corporation has made arrangements at the island for people to pay their respects, including facilities for drinking water and toilets. Thousands of policemen are also engaged in security to manage the large numbers of people coming to pay their respects. Vijayakanth‚Äôs body is set to be taken in a procession from the island to his office in Coimbatore, where he will be cremated. The Tamil Nadu government has announced that he will be cremated with full state honors. After his passing, many prominent figures in the Tamil film industry have expressed their grief and paid tribute to Vijayakanth. Actor Rajinikanth mentioned that Vijayakanth was a man of incredible willpower and would have been the biggest force in Tamil Nadu politics had he been alive. Actors Vijay Antony, Arulnidhi, Livingston, Anjali, as well as music composer Deva‚Äôs son Srikanth Deva, director and actor Bhagyaraj, Sundar C, and his wife actress Khushbu, all visited the island to pay their tributes to Vijayakanth. Former Chief Minister O. Panneerselvam also paid his tributes by garlanding Vijayakanth‚Äôs body, and his wife Premalatha consoled their sons during this difficult time. The passing of Vijayakanth has left a profound impact on the people of Tamil Nadu, with many expressing their grief and mourning the loss of a prominent political and cultural figure in the state.

author: The World - Manuel Rueda
title: Costa Rican coffee farms struggle with labor shortages because of immigration restrictions - The World from PRX | Flipboard
text:
Costa Rican coffee farms struggle with labor shortages because of immigration restrictions - The World from PRX Costa Rica has long depended on Nicaraguan migrant workers to harvest its coffee. But a new set of immigration laws in Nicaragua has made it harder for its farmworkers to leave the country. Every year, during the months of February and March, the Finca Manases farm hires about 80 temporary workers ‚Ä¶
The World - Manuel Rueda ‚Ä¢ 4m

author: Jessica Lea
title: ‚ÄòChristless‚Äô and ‚ÄòUnbiblical‚Äô‚ÄîAlbert Mohler Delivers Scathing Response to Pope Francis‚Äô Interview With CBS
text:
Pope Francis‚Äô recent comments that people are ‚Äúfundamentally good‚Äù have drawn criticism from some Protestants, including Southern Baptist Theological Seminary President Dr. Albert Mohler, who called the pope‚Äôs remarks ‚ÄúChristless‚Äù and said that they were totally opposed to the teachings of Scripture.
‚ÄúWhen you look at the world, what gives you hope?‚Äù CBS Evening News anchor and managing editor Norah O‚ÄôDonnell asked Pope Francis in a wide-ranging
interview that aired Sunday evening.
‚ÄúEverything,‚Äù he replied. ‚ÄúYou see tragedies, but you also see so many beautiful things. You see heroic mothers, heroic men, men who have hopes and dreams. Women who look to the future. That gives me a lot of hope.‚Äù
‚ÄúPeople want to live. People forge ahead, and people are fundamentally good,‚Äù Francis continued. ‚ÄúWe are all fundamentally good. Yes, there are some rogues and sinners, but the heart itself is good.‚Äù
‚ÄúWe are all fundamentally good. Yes, there are some rogues and sinners, but the heart itself is good,‚Äù says Pope Francis.
 [pic.twitter.com/7Be2GrKrdB]
‚Äî 60 Minutes (@60Minutes)
[May 19, 2024]
Albert Mohler Critiques Pope Francis‚Äô Comments
In the first extended interview Pope Francis has given an American broadcast network, he discussed the wars in
Gaza and Ukraine, immigration, climate change, surrogacy, the role of women in the Catholic church, and his decision to allow the blessing of same-sex couples.
It was Francis‚Äô remarks on human nature, however, that have drawn much of the attention of Protestant Christians. Dr. Albert Mohler, who has
criticized Francis before, gave a blistering response to the interview in his edition of ‚Äú The Briefing‚Äù that was published Tuesday, May 21.
RELATED:
Albert Mohler Says the Pope Is Ignoring ‚ÄòThe Words of Jesus‚Äô in Comments on Hell
‚ÄúQuite frankly, I think for some evangelical Protestants, it was the first real introduction to the absolute theological vacuum that is represented by the current incumbent of the
Vatican, the current pope of the Roman Catholic Church, Pope Francis,‚Äù Mohler said.
Mohler said the pope was holding an ‚Äúunbiblical office‚Äù and that Francis‚Äô views are not even compatible with those of Roman Catholicism. ‚ÄúPope Francis represents the absolute worst of theological irresponsibility,‚Äù he said.
The seminary president took issue with remarks Pope Francis made in the middle of the interview, when O‚ÄôDonnell said, ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs why so many people found hope with you, because you‚Äôve been more open and accepting perhaps than other previous leaders of the church.‚Äù
‚ÄúYou have to be open to everything. You have to. Everyone, everyone, everyone. That so-and-so is a sinner. Me too. I am a sinner,‚Äù the pope replied.
‚ÄúEveryone. [Even] someone with a diverse sexual gender, everyone. Everyone in. Everyone,‚Äù he emphasized. ‚ÄúOnce inside, we‚Äôll figure out how to sort it all out. But everyone. Do not forget that. The gospel is for everyone.‚Äù

author: do son
title: CVE-2024-10571 (CVSS 9.8): Critical Flaw in WordPress Chart Plugin Under Active Attack
text: Administrator websites are facing a new threat as attackers actively exploit a critical vulnerability in the popular Chartify ‚Äì WordPress Chart Plugin. This plugin, with over 2,000 active installations, is vulnerable to unauthenticated local file inclusion, enabling attackers to execute malicious code on affected websites. CVE-2024-10571: Unauthenticated Local File Inclusion Flaw Tracked as CVE-2024-10571 and assigned a CVSS score of 9.8, this vulnerability affects all versions of the Chartify plugin up to and including 2.9.5. The flaw stems from improper handling of the ‚Äòsource‚Äô parameter, allowing attackers to inject arbitrary files and execute malicious PHP code. ‚ÄúThis can be used to bypass access controls, obtain sensitive data, or achieve code execution in cases where images and other ‚Äúsafe‚Äù file types can be uploaded and included,‚Äù warns the vulnerability report. Widespread Exploitation Underway The severity of this vulnerability is amplified by its active exploitation in the wild. Wordfence, a leading WordPress security firm, reports blocking a staggering ‚Äú2,207,540 attacks targeting this vulnerability in the past 24 hours.‚Äù This indicates a widespread campaign by malicious actors to compromise vulnerable websites. Urgent Action Required: Update Now! Website administrators using the Chartify plugin are urged to take immediate action to mitigate this threat. The recommended solution is to update to version 2.9.6 or a newer patched version as soon as possible. Protecting Your WordPress Website This incident serves as a stark reminder of the importance of proactive security measures for WordPress websites. Here are some essential steps to protect your site: - Keep Plugins and Themes Updated: Regularly update all plugins and themes to the latest versions to patch security vulnerabilities. - Use a Web Application Firewall (WAF): A WAF can help block malicious traffic and prevent attacks from reaching your website. - Implement Strong Passwords and Two-Factor Authentication: Secure your WordPress admin accounts with strong passwords and enable two-factor authentication for an extra layer of protection. - Regularly Back Up Your Website: Create regular backups of your website files and database to ensure you can quickly recover from a compromise. By taking these proactive steps, you can significantly reduce the risk of falling victim to attacks targeting WordPress vulnerabilities.

author: GABRIEL MART√çNEZ RUBIO
title: Helmut Marko sobre Daniel Ricciardo: "Perdi√≥ su instinto asesino tras dejar Red Bull"
text:
La salida de Daniel Ricciardo de la F√≥rmula 1 ha dejado m√°s que una despedida nost√°lgica. Helmut Marko, asesor de Red Bull, ha sido contundente al explicar las razones detr√°s de la ca√≠da de rendimiento del australiano. Seg√∫n Marko, Ricciardo perdi√≥ su ‚Äúinstinto asesino‚Äù tras abandonar Red Bull , una decisi√≥n que, en su opini√≥n, fue el punto de inflexi√≥n en la carrera del piloto.
Marko cree que el cambio a Renault en 2019 , influenciado por las promesas de Cyril Abiteboul, fue un error que Ricciardo nunca logr√≥ superar . ‚ÄúSu salida de Red Bull fue un momento clave. Despu√©s, en Renault y McLaren, no tuvo coches competitivos . Gan√≥ en Monza, pero bajo circunstancias especiales‚Äù, coment√≥ Marko en una entrevista exclusiva.
Smiling through the years üìÜ #F1 pic.twitter.com/pHRQFPzht8
‚Äî Formula 1 (@F1) September 26, 2024 El asesor de Red Bull se√±al√≥ que Ricciardo ya no mostr√≥ esa agresividad en pista que lo caracteriz√≥ en sus mejores a√±os. ‚ÄúEn sus √∫ltimas temporadas, lo intent√≥, pero esa velocidad y la capacidad de frenar al √∫ltimo segundo ya no estaban . Perdi√≥ ese instinto asesino‚Äù, a√±adi√≥.
Te puede interesar: Daniel Ricciardo cierra su cap√≠tulo en la F1 tras dolorosa decisi√≥n de Red Bull
Helmut Marko advirti√≥ a Ricciardo sobre sus decisiones El salto de Ricciardo a Renault tambi√©n estuvo motivado por sus dudas respecto a la unidad de potencia Honda que Red Bull comenzaba a utilizar. ‚Äú Escuch√≥ m√°s a Renault que a nosotros .
